Title: Ip Man 2
Plot: Having defeated the best fighters of the Imperial Japanese army in occupied Shanghai, Ip Man and his family settle in post-war Hong Kong. Struggling to make a living, Master Ip opens a kung fu school to bring his celebrated art of Wing Chun to the troubled youth of Hong Kong. His growing reputation soon brings challenges from powerful enemies, including pre-eminent Hung Gar master, Hung Quan.
Tagline: Behind every great martial artist lies a teacher.
Stars: Donnie Yen, Sammo Hung, Huang Xiaoming
